description:
🧟‍♂️ 28 YEARS LATER 2: The Bone Temple – Official Trailer (2026) | Horror Thriller 4K
The infection never died… it evolved. 28 Years Later 2: The Bone Temple is the terrifying continuation of Danny Boyle’s rage-filled saga — a descent into horror where survival is no longer enough.

🔎 Film Overview
Set one year after the events of 28 Years Later, survivors discover a hidden sanctuary known as the “Bone Temple.” But inside its walls lies a darker secret: the infected aren’t the only monsters. As cults rise and humanity turns on itself, the few who remain must fight enemies both living and undead.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.

Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
